tool.name: qiime2 diversity procrustes-analysis

param.name: reference
param.label: reference: PCoAResults
param.help: [required] The ordination matrix to which data is fitted to.

param.name: other
param.label: other: PCoAResults
param.help: [required] The ordination matrix that's fitted to the reference ordination.

param.name: dimensions
param.label: dimensions: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [default: 5] The number of dimensions to use when fitting the two matrices

param.name: __q2galaxy__GUI__select__
param.label: permutations: Int % Range(1, None) | Str % Choices('disable')
param.help: [default: 999] The number of permutations to be run when computing p-values. Supplying a value of `disable` will disable permutation testing and p-values will not be calculated (this results in *much* quicker execution time if p-values are not desired).

param.name: permutations
param.label: permutations: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [default: 999] The number of permutations to be run when computing p-values. Supplying a value of `disable` will disable permutation testing and p-values will not be calculated (this results in *much* quicker execution time if p-values are not desired).

tool.help:
QIIME 2: diversity procrustes-analysis ====================================== Procrustes Analysis
Outputs: -------- :transformed_reference.qza: A normalized version of the "reference" ordination matrix. :transformed_other.qza: A normalized and fitted version of the "other" ordination matrix. :disparity_results.qza: The sum of the squares of the pointwise differences between the two input datasets & its p value.
|
Description: ------------ Fit two ordination matrices with Procrustes analysis
|
